description: Clark's freshman year at Iowa ended with a Sweet 16 loss to UConn. Now, with her aim on Iowa's first-ever championship to cap off her final season, a Final Four win over the Huskies must come first.
title: Caitlin Clark once dreamed of going to UConn. Now, she'll face them in the Final Four

description: The Emmy winner starred with John Candy and Catherine O'Hara in "SCTV,″ about a fictional TV station. Flaherty's characters included network boss Guy Caballero and the vampiric TV host Count Floyd.
title: 'SCTV' star and comedian Joe Flaherty dies at 82

description: World Central Kitchen has long brought food to war zones and disaster areas around the world. The deaths of seven of its workers in Gaza come on top of the loss of six workers in Ukraine.
title: World Central Kitchen, led by a humanitarian chef, has fed crisis zones for years

description: Tuesday's call between the two leaders followed through on a pledge they made in November for more frequent contact to try to help stabilize the U.S.-China relationship.
title: Biden and China's Xi make first contact since November with a 'check-in' call

description: The U.S. and Israel are close allies, but they've had sharp disagreements. Are the current differences over the war in Gaza a short-term dispute or a fundamental change in the relationship?
title: This isn't the first time the U.S. and Israel have disagreed over Gaza

description: Two recent studies suggest that prospective homeowners will have to earn more than $100,000 annually to afford a typical home in much of the U.S.
title: You'll need more than $100,000 in income to afford a typical home, studies show

description: A fan of both The Beatles and Beyoncé, 82-year-old Melba Pattillo Beals says the song is more special to her than ever. She is one of the Black students who helped desegregate U.S. public schools.
title: What The Beatles and Beyoncé's 'Blackbird' means to this Little Rock Nine member

description: Florida voters will have the chance to enshrine abortion rights into their constitution. Iran blames Israel for an embassy bombing that killed a top military commander.
title: Florida adds abortion to November ballot; Iran blames Israel for embassy bombing

description: The DCCC is placing billboards in eight swing districts where Republicans supported the Life At Conception Act, NPR has exclusively learned.
title: New ad campaign from Democrats targets vulnerable Republicans over IVF

description: After years of false starts, the Consumer Product Safety Commission looks poised to mandate a blade safety brake on all new table saws sold in the United States.
title: After years of trying, the U.S. government may finally mandate safer table saws

description: The Council on American-Islamic Relations releases its annual Civil Right Report. It details record-high instances of anti-Muslim hate in the wake of the Oct. 7 Hamas attack on Israel.
title: Anti-Muslim bias reports skyrocket after Oct. 7 Hamas attack on Israel

description: Having siblings can mean shared family and childhood experiences — and also shared bedrooms and rivalries. A growing body of research shows us that sibling relationships can shape us for life.
title: At the heart of this cozy coffee shop lies a big sister's love for her little brother

description: Illegal gold mining has ravaged the Peruvian Amazon, leaving behind pollution and denuded landscapes. A group of miners are working with a U.S. charity to restore the forest.
title: Gold mining reduced this Amazon rainforest to a moonscape. Now miners are restoring it

description: Caitlin Clark, the all-time NCAA Division 1 basketball scoring leader, led the Iowa Hawkeyes to victory Monday night, scoring 41 of the team's 94 points in their rematch against LSU.
title: The women's NCAA Final Four is set after Iowa wins its rematch against LSU

description: Following campaigns in other states, Wisconsin primary voters who feel Biden has been too supportive of Israeli military actions in Gaza are using a choice on their ballots to voice their discontent.
title: Protest vote over Biden's handling of Gaza lands in Wisconsin

description: Daybell could potentially face the death penalty over the deaths of two children and his former wife. His current wife, Lori Vallow Daybell, was found guilty of similar charges last year.
title: What to know as Chad Daybell jury selection begins in 'zombie' murder trial in Idaho

description: The two fastest-growing groups of eligible U.S. voters — Latinos and Asian Americans — also have the lowest voter registration rates. Advocates are trying to boost sign-ups for a healthier democracy.
title: Why there's a long-standing voter registration gap for Latinos and Asian Americans

description: The suit filed in federal court argues the April 8 lockdown violates inmates' constitutional rights to practice their faiths by preventing them from taking part in a religiously significant event.
title: New York inmates sue to watch the solar eclipse after prisons ordered locked down

description: The Powerball jackpot climbed to an estimated $1.09 billion after no one matched the game's six numbers Monday night and won the top prize, continuing a three-month-long winless streak.
title: Powerball jackpot rises to $1.09 billion after 3-month-long losing streak continues

description: José Andrés, the founder of the organization that feeds people in war and disaster zones, said Monday that "several"  international volunteers were killed in an Israeli airstrike in the Gaza Strip.
title: An Israeli airstrike has killed World Central Kitchen workers in Gaza, founder says

description: A court filing said the bond was provided by Knight Insurance, a California-based company. The move ensures that New York Attorney General Letitia James can't seize Trump's assets related to the case.
title: Trump posts bond in civil fraud case; has gag order expanded in hush-money trial
